channel.title: Figma on Miquel's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Figma on Miquel's Portfolio

item.title: Junction 2023
item.description: Since I was in Finland for Erasmus, I decided it was a great opportunity to take part in a Hackathon there, and so I joined Junction 2023. Our project Because creating habits is really important, Bernat, Ren√© and me, re-imagined Huawei Health app to make it attractive and satisfying for young people to do sports daily and weekly via a quests system with which everyone can compete as well as cooperate in order to get the most points across your friends and get better deals in Huawei products.
